metadata.title: CVE-2018-8768 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
In Jupyter Notebook before 5.4.1, a maliciously forged notebook file canbypass sanitization to execute JavaScript in the notebook context.Specifically, invalid HTML is 'fixed' by jQuery after sanitization, makingit dangerous.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8768` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jupyter-notebook - 5.4.1-1
python-notebook - 5.4.1-1
python3-notebook - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jupyter-notebook package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
